sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均可表示人的"能力，才能"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: ability, capacity, capability, genius, talent, competence, faculty, gift, aptitude
means: ability ：普通用词，指人先天的或学来的各种能力。
capacity ：侧重指人的潜在能力，通常不指体力，多指才智，尤指接受与领悟能力。
capability ：多用于人，指胜任某项具体工作的能力，也指本身具有、尚未发挥的潜在能力。常与of或for连用。
genius ：语气最强，指天赋的高度才能与智力。
talent ：着重指人某方面具有可发展和倍养的突出天赋才能，但语意比genius弱。
competence ：正式用词，侧重指令人满意的业务能力与水平，达到胜任某项工作等的要求。
gift ：着重个人的天赋的才能或在某方面的显著本领，常暗含不能用一般规律作解释的意味。
aptitude ：多指先天或后天习得的运用自如的能力，常暗示接受能力强，能迅速掌握一种学术训练或艺术技巧。

word_mean: 资质，才能：从事某工作的天赋能力和本领

sentence.Network_en: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.--Zig Ziglar
sentence.Network_cn: 决定你人生高度的，不是你的才能，而是你的态度。

sentence.Network_en: An aptitude for computing is beneficial for students taking this degree.
sentence.Network_cn: 计算才能对于攻读这个学位的学生有益处。

sentence.Network_en: She had no aptitude for nursing.
sentence.Network_cn: 她没有从事护理工作的天资。

lj.lj_ly: he has an aptitude for swimming

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : via Old French from late Latin aptitudo, from aptus (see apt)

encyclopedia.content: 概述： aptitude aptitude 是 Debian GNU/Linux 系统中， 非常神奇的的软件包管理器，基于大名鼎鼎的 APT 机制， 整合了 dselect 和 apt-get的所有功能， 并提供的更多特性，特别是在依赖关系处理上。 aptitude与 apt-get 一样，是 Debian 及其衍生系统中功能极其强大的包管理工具。与 apt-get 不同的是，aptitude在处理依赖问题上更佳一些。举例来说，aptitude在删除一个包时，会同时删除本身所依赖的包。这样，系统中不会残留无

entry.def: Someone's aptitude for a particular kind of work or activity is their ability to learn it quickly and to do it well.

example.ex: An aptitude for computing is beneficial for students taking this degree.
example.tran: 计算才能对于攻读这个学位的学生有益处。

example.ex: Some students have more aptitude for academic work than others.
example.tran: 一些学生比其他学生更有学术才能。

auth_sentence.content: Everyone should receive the training appropriate to his particular aptitude.
auth_sentence.res_content: Everyone should receive the training appropriate to his particular aptitude.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Everyone should receive the training appropriate to his particular aptitude.

auth_sentence.content: Don't assume that individuals have a natural aptitude to adapt.
auth_sentence.res_content: Don't assume that individuals have a natural aptitude to adapt.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Don't assume that individuals have a natural aptitude to adapt.

auth_sentence.content: Disabled applicants will be given preferential consideration in the case of equal aptitude.
auth_sentence.res_content: Disabled applicants will be given preferential consideration in the case of equal aptitude.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Disabled applicants will be given preferential consideration in the case of equal aptitude.

stems_affixes.word_buile: adapt适应+able能……的→adj.有适应能力的
apt适应,能力→adj.有倾向的,适当的
in无+apt能力→adj.不适当的;无能的
adapt[v.使适应,适应[环境]]+ation表名词→适应→适应[各种人]的书→改写本
apt适应,能力+itude性质,状态→有能力的状态
ad一再+apt适应,能力→一再适应[环境]

means.word_mean: (学习方面的)才能, 资质, 天资

sentences.en: That student has an aptitude for mathematics.
sentences.cn: 那个学生有数学方面的天赋。

jushi.english: I had no aptitude for accountancy and began to hate it.
jushi.chinese: 我没有做会计的才能,开始讨厌它了。

jushi.english: She's shown no aptitude for learning languages.
jushi.chinese: 她看不出来有学习语言的天赋。

jushi.english: He has a singular aptitude for 〔in〕 dealing with a crisis.
jushi.chinese: 他有处理危机的杰出才能。
